comments.author: lassey@chromium.org
comments.raw_text: The new API (api level 11) allows for copy and pasting URIs and Intents, where the URIs can allow access to content providers. Supporting this will allow us to be able to copy and paste images, videos etc.
comments.creator: lassey@chromium.org
comments.text: The new API (api level 11) allows for copy and pasting URIs and Intents, where the URIs can allow access to content providers. Supporting this will allow us to be able to copy and paste images, videos etc.

comments.creator: blyakher.a@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: This patch has the necessary functionality, but there are currently no apps that allow for direct pasting of images. The ideas in this patch should be used to optimize image sharing and the pasting of text.
comments.text:
Created attachment 648882
WIP Clipboard Data Share

This patch has the necessary functionality, but there are currently no apps that allow for direct pasting of images. The ideas in this patch should be used to optimize image sharing and the pasting of text.
comments.author: blyakher.a@gmail.com

comments.text: Moving all open Core::Widget: Android bugs to GeckoView::General (then the triage owner of GeckoView will decide which ones are valuable and which ones should be closed).
